scripts.test: npm link "circuits-engine" && npm link "circuits-engine-api-helper" && MOCHA_FILE=$WORKSPACE/junit/CIRCUITS_ENGINE_CIRCUITS_ADD_COMMENT.xml NODE_ENV=test_mock nyc --reporter=cobertura --reporter=lcov --report-dir=$WORKSPACE/coverage/CIRCUITS_ENGINE_CIRCUITS_ADD_COMMENT ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter mocha-junit-reporter test/*
